statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_background_settings;

SELECT user_id, background_url, option_name FROM virtual_background_settings INNER JOIN user_background_preferences ON virtual_background_settings.id = user_background_preferences.selected_background_id INNER JOIN background_customization_options ON user_background_preferences.selected_option_id = background_customization_options.option_id;
